content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?

content: Did you agree on a final price?

content: [Question for the role of Peter Schmidt]

content: Since there was no final agreement, I cannot provide an exact number. However, Maryam offered $1,500 per month, which I found to be too low considering the location and amenities of the apartment. I was looking for at least $1,800 per month.

content: [Answer for the role of Peter Schmidt] Since there was no final agreement, I cannot provide an exact number. However, Maryam offered 800 Euro per month, which I found to be too low considering the location and amenities of the apartment. I was looking for at least 850 Euro per month.
